item.title: Understanding the Constitution of Knowledge
item.description:
Understanding the “Constitution of Knowledge” by Jonathan Rauch

Recently, I attended a Burning Man-style event that exposed me to a wide range of ideas and new ways of thinking about happiness and living life. One conversation stood out to me: how we integrate radical ideas into our society and decide which ideas to trust. This sparked my interest in Jonathan Rauch’s book, The Constitution of Knowledge: A Defense of Truth.
